title: UK's FCA fines TP ICAP unit 15.4 million pounds
text:
UK's FCA fines TP ICAP unit 15.4 million pounds

Stock Markets 27 minutes ago (Oct 11, 2019 02:31AM ET)

© Reuters. UK's FCA fines TP ICAP unit 15.4 million pounds (Reuters) - Britain's Financial Conduct Authority said it had fined a unit of TP ICAP (L: ) 15.4 million pounds in relation to an investigation over some trades in 2008-2011, after the watchdog found some former managers failed to act with "due skill, care and diligence". The FCA had also found that at the time there were inadequate systems and controls in place to deal with the risk of improper broker conduct, the company said in a separate statement.
